import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../assets/css/Login.css"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import baseUrl from "../../baseUrl"; const CreateProduct = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [currentTag, setCurrentTag] = useState('flower') const handleTag = (tag) => { setCurrentTag(tag) }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() const title = event.target.title.value const description = event.target.description.value const tag = currentTag const primaryImg = event.target.primaryImg.value const img_1 = event.target.img_1.value const img_2 = event.target.img_2.value const img_3= event.target.img_3.value const img_4 = event.target.img_4.value const response = await fetch(`${baseUrl}/api/product/create/`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify({ title:title, description:description, tag:tag, primaryImg:primaryImg, img_1:img_1, img_2:img_2, img_3:img_3, img_4:img_4 }) }) if(response.status===201){ navigate("/dashboard") } else{ console.log(response) } console.log({ title, description, tag, primaryImg }) } const handleCancel = () => { navigate("/dashboard"); }; return (

Create Product

)}
); }; export default CreateProduct;
